At least for UOB lady travel  you can appeal if UOB doesn't recognize it as travel agency. I read people appealing for flight tix that wasnt registered as airlines in UOB system.

NATAS fair and ASA  are under mcc 7991 and are not under Lady bonus category. Quite a number of people kena this trap. Some appeal successfully n some failed. Hence  not advise to use Lady on NATAS and ASA.
A better option will be using UOB PPV(max $1.1k)  or VS(min $1k  max $2k) n pay viamobile contactless.
